teaser: Airing on Monday, June 1, 2015: First up, we'll talk with Robin Feldman, Professor of Law at UC Hastings, about why it’s hard to know whether or not you can copyright a bit of software. Plus, the spectrum auction does not happen until 2016, but there's already a lot of interest in what's for sale. The reason? The spectrum that's for sale is primo. And T-Mobile wants a big piece of it. We'll also talk to Gretchen Harnick, Assistant Professor of Fashion Marketing at the New School, about Instagram’s influence in the fashion industry.

title: Marketplace Tech for Monday, June 1, 2015
